Title: Four in a Jeep
Writer: William Harding (dialogue), Hans Sahl (scenario collaborator), Richard Schweizer (scenario), William Michael Treichlinger (scenario collaborator)
Actors: Viveca Lindfors, Ralph Meeker, Yossi Yadin, Michael Medwin
Plot: In post-war Vienna, occupied by the Allies, four sergeants representing each of the occupying nations (USA, England, France, Soviet Union)patrol in the same Jeep. One day they are given the...
